ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: That night they came back to their father in tears,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: At nightfall they came to their father weeping,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: At nightfall they came to their father weeping
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: In the evening they returned to their father weeping
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And at nightfall they came to their father, weeping.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And they came to their father in the early part of the night weeping.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And they came to their father at nightfall, weeping.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And they came to their father in the evening, and they were weeping.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And they came weeping to their father in the evening.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: And at nightfall they came to their father, weeping.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And they came to their father at nightfall, weeping.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: In the evening, they came weeping to their father.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Then they came to their father in the early part of the night, weeping.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And they came to their father in the early part of the night weeping.

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And they came to their father in the evening weeping.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And they came to their father at night, weeping.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [12:16] And they came to their father in the evening, weeping.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And they came weeping to their father in the evening) after midday.
